review: Non functional junk. I get HDCP errors. There appears to be no real fix. I'm shocked Amazon let this buggy piece of crap on the market.

review: Confusing to set up. could`nt get back off to put in batteries. Needa arrows and start on controls. learning how to use. Excuse me I`m an old fart.

review: This is extremely easy to set up and works flawlessly!

review: We LOVE it! Super easy to setup and use. We have watched nothing on regular cable since getting the Fire Stick! And the music selection is amazing, such an awesome way to listen to all your favorites. I highly recommend the Fire Stick to all Prime Members and anyone thinking about becoming a Prime Member. Worth every single penny!
author: Cassie Sterling

review: Im very happy with the fire stick
